# README

All calls with examples of their JSON response object. Or in some cases the JSON of the request body.
```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = ""
)
ba_fns <- list.files(pattern = "ba_[a-z_\\.]{1,50}md")

ba_fns <- stringr::str_replace(ba_fns, "\\.md", "")

tpl <- paste0("[", ba_fns, "](https://github.com/c5sire/brapi/blob/master/inst/apidocs/", ba_fns, ".md)") 

```
`r tpl`
